channel.title: Model on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Model on Notes

item.title: Lean option and Hydrate method in Mongoose
item.description: Lean and Hydrate in Mongoose Lean option on Query Typically, when returning data from the database as an API response, the virtuals/methods available on a mongoose document are unnecessary.

item.title: Model Relations in Mongoose
item.description: Model Relations Relations are logical links which define how models are connected with each other.

item.title: Custom Model Methods in Loopback
item.description: Loopback models can be extended by adding custom methods to them.

item.title: Enable Destroy All API for a model in Loopback
item.description: Destroy All API (Model.destroyAll()) is, by default, disabled to avoid accidental bulk deletion of data.
